code: import{initialState}from'./inventoryAPI';import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{searchFilterSelector}from'../ProductFilter/searchFilterSlice';export var loadData=function loadData(){return{type:'inventory/loadState',payload:initialState};};export var inventorySelector=function inventorySelector(state){return state.inventory;};var options={name:'inventory',initialState:initialState,reducer:{loadState:function loadState(state,action){state.initialState=action.payload;}}};export var allFilteredClothing=function allFilteredClothing(state){var clothing=inventorySelector(state);var searchTerm=searchFilterSelector(state);return clothing;};export var inventorySlice=createSlice(options);
